snippet.title: Little Survivors - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam for a release on October 1 2024! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2655770/Little_Survivors/

Little Survivors is a short and accessible action rogue-lite, with an emphasis on simple but satisfying combat against monsters. Enter comic books, free animals, then use them to attack the vile Glurks!

This video game might interest those who like The Binding of Isaac, Asterix, Kid Paddle and Game Over.
